channel.title: WebClient help
channel.description: Ok so when I put my backround picture on the web and I try to get the picture like this:[code]Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(new URL("http://img357.imageshack.us/img357/5404/servernamehereqc6.jpg"));[/code] I can run my client fine and get the backround. But when i put it on the web, I cant get the backround. It says retrying connection in 5 or something like that. Can anyone help me?

item.title: WebClient help
item.dc:creator: @meowmix101 meowmix101
item.description:
@meowmix101 wrote:

I can run my client fine and get the backround. But when i put it on the web, I cant get the backround. It says retrying connection in 5 or something like that. Can anyone help me?
